Bullet remained silent trying to recall the events he was accused of. They =
had security tapes that showed the activity so there was no use denying tha=
t it had happened. He sat silently waiting for his punishment.

inal Message -----

    Bullet leaned forward placing =
a hand on the surface of the desk to resiter
    his signature. Now at leas=
t he knew that he was a recent transfer to this
    unit which explained wh=
y he didn't know any of the bots he'd met.

    He didn't remember anything=
 about a large bot named Typhon, it must have
    happened while he was enr=
aged. "I understand sir." He said lucky that this
    was only a slap on th=
e wrist. "I'll try not to let it happen again." He sat
    back again after=
 the scanner took his frequency, "Unless I have a Maximal at
    the tips o=
f my horns." For some reason he fealt the need to boast about his
    abili=
ties, he was one sure SOB (Son Of a Bot)

    There was one other question =
that needed answered before he could fully
    accept what was going on. "W=
hen can I expect to meet Darkfate?" he asked
    wanting an assesment of th=
e leader before going into battle.

con... but if you don't learn how hold yours circuits, one
